alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:42PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Prowers and eastern Kiowa Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 542 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Towner, or 22 miles north of Coolidge, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Sheridan Lake, Neeoshe Reservoir, Towner, Chivington, Brandon and Queens Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County
